name: Two Slimentions
description:
Two Slimentions is a puzzle-platformer where you flip between two different worlds to solve puzzles! The twist? Your moveset flips between stomping on enemies to shooting them!

Made for BenBonk Jam #3!

Controls:

  • [Arrows/WASD] - Move
  • [Z/J] - Jump (Can defeat enemies while Blue)
  • [X/K] - Shoot (While Red)
  • [C/L] - Swap Dimensions
  • [R] - Reset
  • [ESC] - Pause
